column2: This map mode shows all independent Realms.
This map mode highlights your own Realm (your holdings and those of your vassals.)
This map mode highlights your own Demesne (your own holdings).
This map mode show the spread of all religions in Britain.
This map mode shows the distribution of distinct cultures.
This map mode shows all the geographical and traditional ('de jure') high lordships and palatine kingdoms.
This map mode shows all the geographical and traditional ('de jure') kingdoms.
This map mode shows your diplomatic relations with other rulers.
This map mode shows all the lords.
This map mode shows all the high lords and vassal kings.
This map mode shows all the Kings.
This map mode shows direct vassals under independent rulers.
This map mode shows all the players and their realms.
This map mode shows all the geographical and traditional ('de jure') High Kingdoms.
This map mode shows the income levels of the provinces.
This map mode shows the risk of a peasant uprising.
This map mode shows the ruling dynasties of Britain.
This map mode shows the opinions of other rulers toward the selected character.
